component.name: Trial Submission Studio
component.summary: Transform clinical trial data into FDA-compliant CDISC formats

description.p: Trial Submission Studio is a desktop application that transforms clinical trial data into FDA-compliant CDISC formats (SDTM). Built with Rust and the Iced GUI library, it provides a cross-platform tool that works completely offline with embedded CDISC standards.

ul.li: Import CSV files and transform them to SDTM-compliant datasets
Fuzzy column mapping with confidence scores
CDISC conformance validation with embedded standards
Export to XPT (V5/V8), Dataset-XML, and Define-XML 2.1
Completely offline operation - no external API calls

description.p: Initial alpha release with core SDTM transformation capabilities.
